description: This file defines a React component named Dashboard that fetches and displays a list of notes from a Supabase backend, with filtering based on search parameters and categories. It includes state management, effect hooks for data fetching, and rendering logic for loading, empty, and populated states.

methods.name: Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey })
methods.description: React function component that renders a notes dashboard with filtering and search capabilities.

ctags.name: Dashboard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey }) {$/
